 IN THE HEART OF THE CITY   
 A PLACE OF NATURE, CULTURE AND SPIRITUALITY, SAINT JOSEPH’S ORATORY WELCOMES YOU  IN THE HEART OF THE CITY    
 SAINT BROTHER ANDRÉ PATRON SAINT OF FAMILY CAREGIVERS IN CANADA   
 READ MORE  
 SAINT JOSEPH LIKES MONTREAL EXHIBITION AT THE ORATORY MUSEUM UNTIL APRIL 2, 2018.   
 READ MORE  
 RICH IN NATURE  
 WITH VAST SPACES OF GREENERY AND MAGNIFICENT GARDENS, THE ORATORY OFFERS A NATURAL SITE OF EXCEPTION ON THE NORTH HILLSIDE OF THE MOUNT ROYAL.   
 DISCOVER MORE  
 AN INCREDIBLE JOURNEY  
 THE SMALL CHAPEL FOUNDED IN 1904 BY SAINT BROTHER ANDRÉ BECAME, OVER THE YEARS, THE LARGEST SANCTUARY DEDICATED  TO SAINT JOSEPH IN THE WORLD.   
 EXPLORE THE TIMELINE  
 DAILY MASS  
 EVERYDAY, THE ORATORY'S PASTORAL TEAM WELCOMES YOU FOR THE EUCHARIST. THE MORNING MASS IN FRENCH, CELEBRATED IN THE CRYPT CHURCH MON - SAT AT 8:30 IS BROADCASTED LIVE  HERE  AND IS AVAILABLE THROUGHOUT THE DAY    
 CONSULT THE MASS SCHEDULE  
 A HERITAGE TO CELEBRATE  
 OUR PASTORAL THEME INVITES US ALL, THROUGH OUR WORDS AND OUR ACTIONS, TO CELEBRATE THE HERITAGE OF BROTHER ANDRÉ.   
 READ MORE

 Our mission 
 Saint Joseph’s Oratory of Mount Royal, founded by Saint Brother André, is a Catholic shrine dedicated to Saint Joseph. Place of expression of faith, prayer, healing and peace, the Oratory welcomes pilgrims and visitors in a spirit of openness and compassion. 
 Our vision 
 To be, in the heart of the city, the place of openness, gathering and reflection, where the heritage of Saint Brother André thrives.
